objenome.util.bean

Enum ObjectUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ObjectUtil>
      • objenome.util.bean.ObjectUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ObjectUtil>

    public enum ObjectUtil
extends java.lang.Enum<ObjectUtil>
    Helper class with static methods for accessing bean methods (getters/setters).
    Author:
    Peter Fichtner
